mapper.select: select u.id id,u.name name,u.sex sex,u.academyId academyId ,u.admin admin,u.phone phone, u.mail mail ,u.`status` status ,u.description description,a.`name` adminname from user u,admin a where u.admin=a.id and u.id=#{id} and u.password=#{password}
